parameters.query:
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS global;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.vat_companies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    vat_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    branch TEXT NOT NULL,

    company_name TEXT,
    address      TEXT,

    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),

    CONSTRAINT vat_company_unique UNIQUE (vat_id, branch)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.workflow_errors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    workflow_name TEXT,
    workflow_id TEXT,
    execution_id TEXT,
    execution_url TEXT,
    last_node TEXT,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_stack TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global.workflow_batches (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    batch_name TEXT,
    total_files INT,
    completed_files INT DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    status TEXT DEFAULT 'pending'
);

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- 0) ถ้ามี schema เดิมอยู่ → ลบทิ้งทั้งหมด (รวมตาราง)
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS {{
  $json.schema
    .toLowerCase()
    .replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
}} CASCADE;

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- 1) สร้าง schema ใหม่
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS {{
  $json.schema
    .toLowerCase()
    .replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
}};

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- 2) ตาราง invoices: เก็บข้อมูลจริงจาก PDF
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {{
  $json.schema.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
}}.invoices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    invoice_number   TEXT,
    date_raw         TEXT,
    doc_title        TEXT,

    vendor_name      TEXT,
    vendor_vat_id    TEXT,
    vendor_branch    TEXT,

    net_amount       NUMERIC(15,2),
    vat_amount       NUMERIC(15,2),
    grand_total      NUMERIC(15,2),

    name             TEXT UNIQUE,
    path             TEXT UNIQUE,
    is_done          BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,

    CONSTRAINT invoices_unique_triplet
      UNIQUE (invoice_number, vendor_vat_id, vendor_branch),

    created_at       TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- 3) ตาราง summary: 1-to-1 กับ invoices + unique composite key
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {{
  $json.schema.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
}}.invoice_check_summary (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    invoice_id INT UNIQUE REFERENCES {{
      $json.schema.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
    }}.invoices(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,

    invoice_number    TEXT NOT NULL,
    vendor_vat_id     TEXT NOT NULL,
    vendor_branch     TEXT NOT NULL,

    invoice_status              BOOLEAN,
    buyer_vat_info_status       BOOLEAN,
    invoice_number_status       BOOLEAN,
    date_raw_status             BOOLEAN,
    vendor_name_status          BOOLEAN,
    vendor_vat_id_status        BOOLEAN,
    vendor_vat_id_info_status   BOOLEAN,
    vendor_branch_status        BOOLEAN,
    net_amount_status           BOOLEAN,
    vat_amount_status           BOOLEAN,
    grand_total_status          BOOLEAN,

    buyer_address_status        BOOLEAN,
    buyer_address_reason        TEXT,

    missing_in_pdf      BOOLEAN,
    missing_in_excel    BOOLEAN,
    all_ok              BOOLEAN,

    updated_at          TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),

    CONSTRAINT uq_invoice_check_summary
        UNIQUE (invoice_number, vendor_vat_id, vendor_branch)
);

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- 4) ตาราง Excel purchase tax
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {{
  $json.schema.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9_]/g, '_')
}}.excel_purchase_tax (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    invoice_number   TEXT,
    date_raw         TEXT,
    doc_title        TEXT,
    vendor_name      TEXT,
    vendor_vat_id    TEXT,
    vendor_branch    TEXT,

    net_amount       NUMERIC(15,2),
    vat_amount       NUMERIC(15,2),
    grand_total      NUMERIC(15,2),

    created_at       TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
